A solar panel receives energy from the Sun at a rate of \(5.0 \text{kW}\)
Thermal energy is transferred from the solar panel to water with an efficiency of \(20\%\)
Cold water of mass \(15\mathrm{kg}\) enters the solar panel every hour
The specific heat capacity of water is \(4200 \text{J} / (\text{kg} \circ \text{C})\)
Calculate the temperature increase of the water
temperature increase =   .........  \(^\circ \text{C}\)

advantage
explanation
disadvantage
